community.rulesSummary: Please keep the community safe and helpful. Be kind, protect privacy, and share accurate info‚Äîespecially for urgent cases.
community.rulesBody:
Welcome to PawsSafe Community.

‚Ä¢ Be kind and respectful.
‚Ä¢ No personal data (addresses, phone numbers) in public posts.
‚Ä¢ For emergencies, include city + neighborhood and what help is needed.
‚Ä¢ No scams: donation links must be verifiable.
‚Ä¢ Report spam or harmful content.

campaignProfile.everyContribution: Every contribution, no matter how small, makes a real difference in the lives of animals in need. Your support helps us provide essential care, shelter, and medical treatment to stray and abandoned animals across Bulgaria.
campaignProfile.allDonationsTracked: All donations are tracked transparently, and we provide regular updates on how your contributions are being used. Together, we can make a lasting impact on animal welfare in our communities.

case1.title: Max needs urgent surgery
case1.description: Found with a broken leg near the park. Needs immediate medical attention.
case1.story: Max was found by a kind passerby near Central Park, limping badly with what appeared to be a broken hind leg. Despite his pain, he showed incredible trust in humans, allowing rescuers to approach and carefully transport him to the emergency clinic. The veterinary team has assessed his condition and determined that he needs surgery as soon as possible to ensure a full recovery.

u1.title: Max has arrived at the clinic
u1.description: After a careful rescue operation, Max is now safely at VetCare Sofia where the team is preparing him for surgery.

u2.title: Pre-surgery examination complete
u2.description: X-rays confirm a clean break. Surgery is scheduled for tomorrow morning. Max is resting comfortably with pain medication.

u3.title: Surgery successful!
u3.description: Max's surgery went perfectly! The vet expects a full recovery within 6-8 weeks. Thank you to all donors!

case2.title: Whiskers needs emergency care
case2.description: Abandoned kitten with respiratory infection. Requires immediate treatment.
case2.story: Little Whiskers was found in a cardboard box behind a restaurant, barely breathing and severely dehydrated. This tiny fighter, estimated to be only 4 weeks old, was brought to our partner clinic where vets discovered a severe respiratory infection. Without immediate treatment, Whiskers wouldn't have survived another day.

u1.title: Emergency intake
u1.description: Whiskers arrived in critical condition. Started IV fluids and antibiotics immediately.

u2.title: Slight improvement
u2.description: Whiskers is responding to treatment! Breathing is easier and she's starting to show interest in food.

case3.title: Luna found her forever home!
case3.description: After 6 months of recovery, Luna has been adopted by a loving family.
case3.story: Luna's journey began in the summer when she was found wandering the Sea Garden, severely malnourished and scared. Through months of dedicated care, proper nutrition, and lots of love, Luna transformed into a happy, healthy dog ready for adoption. Her story shows what's possible when a community comes together.

u1.title: Rescue day
u1.description: Luna was found in the Sea Garden, scared but friendly. Brought to the shelter for evaluation.

u2.title: Ready for adoption
u2.description: After full recovery, vaccinations, and spaying, Luna is ready to find her forever family!

u3.title: Adopted!
u3.description: Luna has found her perfect family! The Petrov family fell in love at first sight. Happy tails ahead!

case4.title: Rex recovering from accident
case4.description: Hit by a car, Rex survived but needs long-term rehabilitation.
case4.story: Rex was hit by a speeding car on a busy road. A group of teenagers witnessed the accident and immediately called for help. Against all odds, Rex survived but sustained significant injuries requiring extensive rehabilitation. He's a fighter who deserves every chance at a normal life.

u1.title: Emergency surgery complete
u1.description: Rex made it through emergency surgery. The next 48 hours are critical but the vet team is optimistic.

u2.title: Rex is stable
u2.description: Great news! Rex is eating on his own and starting to wag his tail. Physical therapy will begin next week.

p1.description: Bulgaria's leading pet store chain, providing quality supplies and supporting adoption events.

p6.description: Provides specialized nutrition for animals with medical conditions.

p8.name: Paws & Claws Club

v1.name: Maria Ivanova
v1.bio: Dedicated animal rescuer with 5 years of experience. Specializes in emergency rescues and foster care coordination.

v2.name: Ivan Petrov
v2.bio: Veterinary student passionate about animal welfare. Helps with medical care and post-surgery rehabilitation.

v3.name: Elena Dimitrova
v3.bio: Professional dog trainer offering free behavioral consultations for rescued animals to improve their adoption chances.

p1.content: Just brought little Mila to her foster home! üè† She was found abandoned near the train station, but look at her now - already making herself comfortable. Looking for her forever family! #AdoptDontShop

p2.content: Amazing news! Rex completed his 6-week rehabilitation program today! üéâ From barely being able to walk to running and playing - this is why we do what we do. Thank you all for your support and donations!

p3.content: Can anyone recommend a good vet clinic in Plovdiv for a stray cat I found? She seems to have an eye infection and I want to help her. Any advice appreciated! üôè
